SimplicitObjects.Name: Possibly use this to set up multi object scenes later for io/indexing
SimplicitObjects.SetFixedBC_code: indices = torch.nonzero(X0[:,1] < -100.5, as_tuple=False).squeeze() #fix the whole left side of shape
